summary: Sometimes after picking up Auriel's Bow in the quest Touching the Sky (Dawnguard questline), the next quest Kindred Judgement won't start, this mod fixes this.
descriptionHtml:
On some occasions, after Gelebor gives you Auriel's Bow, the Dawnguard quesline will break and you won't be able to advance to the next quest (Kindred Judgement), my guess is this is caused by a mod conflict and for some reason the setstage console command doesn't work, this mod fixes that.

VERY IMPORTANT: AFTER YOU ACTIVATE THE MOD AND PICK UP AURIEL'S BOW, YOU STILL NEED TO USE THE FOLLOWING CONSOLE COMMAND:

setstage DLC1VQ08 20

Remember to only use the command AFTER you pick up Auriel's Bow.

If you attack Volkihar and the door to the boss room is locked, type in the console: coc DLC1vampirecastlebossroom , this will teleport you to where Harkon is, kill him and leave the room, the quest should be over as soon as you kill him.
author: Xoninho
